byline.contributor: Andrea Elliott contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Shabab posts a recorded suicide message online that appears to be the voice of Abdisalan Hussein Ali, 22-year-old Somalian-American who spent his formative years in Minneapolis before joining the rebels; he is said to have blown himself up in suicide bomb attack on African Union troops in Mogadishu, Somalia.
snippet: An Islamist militia in Somalia said that Abdisalan Hussein Ali, who spent his formative years in Minneapolis, was one of two bombers in a suicide attack in Mogadishu.
lead_paragraph: An Islamist militia in Somalia said that Abdisalan Hussein Ali, who spent his formative years in Minneapolis, was one of two bombers in a suicide attack in Mogadishu.

headline.main: American Identified as Bomber in Attack on African Union in Somalia
headline.print_headline: American Identified as Bomber in Attack on African Union in Somalia
headline.seo: Shabab Identify American as Bomber in Somalia Attack
